name: Infinity Maze (Ver 0.1)
description:
Movement:  W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys.

This game for now is only a little experiment that I want to polish from this first version to a complete game with multiple modes

You have to go from the starting point to the end blue point.

In this game you will be completing mazes forever, have two modes:

- Classic Mode: A simple maze, like that labyrinths that you see in the tablecloths for kids in a fast food restaurant

- Invisible Walls: Same as above, but the wall make invisible in 2 seconds, so you must remember the path

PD: Sorry for my English.
